prompt:
${transcript} 
 based on above sales transcript, score the call quality, based criteria json below, replace placeholder value in “<…>” with your assessment score % (out ouf given weight %) and reason, and return response only in json format: ${JSON.stringify(criteriaJson)}

criteria.description: Did the agent communicate introduction accurately?
Did the agent ensure speaking to the decision maker for ad posting?
Did the agent ask questions to understand the customer preferred posting channel? ( Recruiter or LinkedIn)
Did the agent ask questions to understand the current hiring needs? Including 'Rational Benefits' at least 1 before solutioning?
Did the agent pitch Intelligent Hire/Intelligent Hire Pro effectively?
Did the agent advised customer about the benefits of the Intelligent Hire/Intelligent Hire Pro.
Did the agent acknowledged the identified objection?
Did the agent ask clarifying questions to uncover the reason of objection?
Did the agent attempt to overcome all objections by using provided recommended spiels to the customer?
Did the Agent recap the closing statement using the trial closing method?
Did the Agent inform the customer that he/she will also send an email for reference?
